mapper.select: select apo.id, apo.name, apo.is_stretch as stretch, apo.plan_bv, apo.actual_bv, apo.level_code, apo.pi_id, apo.program_id, apo.project_id, apo.object_version_number, apo.creation_date, apo.last_update_date from agile_pi_objective apo where apo.project_id = #{projectId} and apo.pi_id = #{piId} order by apo.id desc
